results.title: Current view of diagnosis and treatment of latent autoimmune diabetes in adults.
results.text_hl: Nevertheless it may be falsely classified as @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus_Type_2 @DISEASE_MESH:D003924 @@@type 2 diabetes@@@, especially, when diagnosed in older age and for the possibility of non-@CHEMICAL_Insulin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D007328 @@@insulin@@@ treatment for at least 6 months after diagnosis. @<m>DISEASE_Latent_Autoimmune_Diabetes_in_Adults</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000071698 @@@LADA@@@ is treated early with @CHEMICAL_Insulin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D007328 @@@insulin@@@ and combined with @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ in @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with a higher level of @DISEASE_Insulin_Resistance @DISEASE_MESH:D007333 @@@insulin resistance@@@.

citations.NLM: Urbanová J, Brunerová L, Malinovská J, Pelechová B, Koberová L, Brož J. Current view of diagnosis and treatment of latent autoimmune diabetes in adults. Vnitr Lek. 2021 Spring;67(2):97-102. PMID: 34074108
citations.BibTeX: @article{34074108, title={Current view of diagnosis and treatment of latent autoimmune diabetes in adults.}, author={Urbanová J and Brunerová L and Malinovská J and Pelechová B and Koberová L and Brož J}, journal={Vnitr Lek}, volume={67}, number={2}, pages={97-102}}

results.title: Diagnostic Dilemmas and Current Treatment Approaches in Latent Onset Autoimmune Diabetes in Adults: A Concise Review.
results.text_hl: Finally, we have explored the treatment strategies involved in the management of @<m>DISEASE_Latent_Autoimmune_Diabetes_in_Adults</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000071698 @@@LADA@@@. In conclusion, the usual management includes treatment with @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ and the addition of low doses of @GENE_INS @GENE_3630 @@@insulin@@@.

citations.NLM: Chandran L, Singh A, Chitra V. Diagnostic Dilemmas and Current Treatment Approaches in Latent Onset Autoimmune Diabetes in Adults: A Concise Review. Curr Diabetes Rev. 2022 Mar 24;():. PMID: 35331118
citations.BibTeX: @article{35331118, title={Diagnostic Dilemmas and Current Treatment Approaches in Latent Onset Autoimmune Diabetes in Adults: A Concise Review.}, author={Chandran L and Singh A and Chitra V}, journal={Curr Diabetes Rev}}

results.title: Diabetic ketoacidosis as first presentation of latent autoimmune diabetes in adults in a patient with hashitoxicosis as first presentation of Hashimoto's thyroiditis: a case report
results.text_hl: ...@<m>DISEASE_Latent_Autoimmune_Diabetes_in_Adults</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000071698 @@@LADA@@@, or @<m>DISEASE_Latent_Autoimmune_Diabetes_in_Adults</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000071698 @@@type 1.5 DM@@@, is the most common form of @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus_Type_1 @DISEASE_MESH:D003922 @@@adult-onset autoimmune diabetes@@@.

citations.NLM: Xenou M, Zoupas I, Lygnos D, Fousteris E. Diabetic ketoacidosis as first presentation of latent autoimmune diabetes in adults in a patient with hashitoxicosis as first presentation of Hashimoto's thyroiditis: a case report J Med Case Rep. 2022 Aug 3;16(1):297. PMID: 35918735
citations.BibTeX: @article{35918735, title={Diabetic ketoacidosis as first presentation of latent autoimmune diabetes in adults in a patient with hashitoxicosis as first presentation of Hashimoto's thyroiditis: a case report}, author={Xenou M and Zoupas I and Lygnos D and Fousteris E}, journal={J Med Case Rep}, volume={16}, number={1}, pages={297}}

results.title: Avoiding COVID-19 complications with diabetic patients could be achieved by multi-dose Bacillus Calmette-Guerin vaccine: a case study of beta cells regeneration.
results.text_hl: As the @<m>DISEASE_Latent_Autoimmune_Diabetes_in_Adults</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000071698 @@@diabetic MODY-5@@@ @SPECIES_9606 @@@patient@@@ (mutation of @GENE_HNF1B @GENE_6928 @@@HNF1B@@@, @VARIANT_tmVar:p|SUB|V|2|L;HGVS:p.V2L;VariantGroup:0 @@@Val2Leu@@@) was on low dose @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Riomet@@@  while eliminating @GENE_INS @GENE_3630 @@@insulin@@@ gradually, a simple analytical method for @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ assay was recommended to ensure its concentration before use as it is not approved yet by the Egyptian QC labs.

citations.NLM: Ayoub BM, Ramadan E, Ashoush N, Tadros MM, Hendy MS, Elmazar MM, Mousa SA. Avoiding COVID-19 complications with diabetic patients could be achieved by multi-dose Bacillus Calmette-Guerin vaccine: a case study of beta cells regeneration. Pharmazie. 2020 Aug 1;75(8):375-380. PMID: 32758336
citations.BibTeX: @article{32758336, title={Avoiding COVID-19 complications with diabetic patients could be achieved by multi-dose Bacillus Calmette-Guerin vaccine: a case study of beta cells regeneration.}, author={Ayoub BM and Ramadan E and Ashoush N and Tadros MM and Hendy MS and Elmazar MM and Mousa SA}, journal={Pharmazie}, volume={75}, number={8}, pages={375-380}}

results.title: [Detection of LADA-type diabetes in overweight diabetic patients. Is treatment with metformin suitable?].
authors: Investigadores Asociados del Catalonian Overweight and Diabetes Study Group
results.text_hl: @<m>DISEASE_Latent_Autoimmune_Diabetes_in_Adults</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000071698 @@@Type-1 LADA@@@ @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ improved their metabolic control after @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ treatment and showed a drastic decrease in @GENE_INS @GENE_3630 @@@insulin@@@ levels.

citations.NLM: Lóriz Peralta O, Campos Bonilla B, Granada Ybern ML, Sanmartí Sala A, Arroyo Bros J, Investigadores Asociados del Catalonian Overweight and Diabetes Study Group. [Detection of LADA-type diabetes in overweight diabetic patients. Is treatment with metformin suitable?]. Aten Primaria. 2007 Mar;39(3):133-7. PMID: 17386205
citations.BibTeX: @article{17386205, title={[Detection of LADA-type diabetes in overweight diabetic patients. Is treatment with metformin suitable?].}, author={Lóriz Peralta O and Campos Bonilla B and Granada Ybern ML and Sanmartí Sala A and Arroyo Bros J and Investigadores Asociados del Catalonian Overweight and Diabetes Study Group}, journal={Aten Primaria}, volume={39}, number={3}, pages={133-7}}

results.title: Randomized, controlled, parallel-group prospective study to investigate the clinical effectiveness of early insulin treatment in patients with latent autoimmune diabetes in adults
results.text_hl: ...@<m>DISEASE_Latent_Autoimmune_Diabetes_in_Adults</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000071698 @@@Latent autoimmune diabetes in adults@@@ [@<m>DISEASE_Latent_Autoimmune_Diabetes_in_Adults</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000071698 @@@LADA@@@] is a @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus_Type_1 @DISEASE_MESH:D003922 @@@type 1 diabetes@@@ that is slowly developing.

citations.NLM: Brophy S, Davies H, Bain S, Stephens JW, Cheung WY, Richards K, Wareham K, Beaverstock C, Lloyd J, Page D, Williams M, Russell I, Williams R. Randomized, controlled, parallel-group prospective study to investigate the clinical effectiveness of early insulin treatment in patients with latent autoimmune diabetes in adults BMC Endocr Disord. 2008 Jul 24;8():8. PMID: 18652676

results.title: Polycystic Ovary Syndrome (PCOS) in Juvenile and Adult Type 1 Diabetes in a German/Austrian Cohort.
results.text_hl: Discussion While @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus_Type_1 @DISEASE_MESH:D003922 @@@T1D@@@ and comorbid @DISEASE_Polycystic_Ovary_Syndrome @DISEASE_MESH:D011085 @@@PCOS@@@ showed features of a "@<m>DISEASE_Latent_Autoimmune_Diabetes_in_Adults</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000071698 @@@type 1.5 diabetes@@@" phenotype, @GENE_INS @GENE_3630 @@@insulin@@@ requirements per kg body weight were not higher and metabolic control was better, which could be explained only partially by additional @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ therapy.

citations.NLM: Reinauer C, Bollow E, Fröhlich-Reiterer E, Laubner K, Bergis D, Schöfl C, Kempe HP, Hummel M, Hennes P, Gollisch K, Haberland H, Datz N, Meissner T, Holl RW. Polycystic Ovary Syndrome (PCOS) in Juvenile and Adult Type 1 Diabetes in a German/Austrian Cohort. Exp Clin Endocrinol Diabetes. 2017 Nov;125(10):661-668. PMID: 28926868
